meta.description:
TLD: TH
Language Tag: th-TH
Language Description: Thai
Version: 1.0
Effective Date: 21 June 2004
     Registry: Thailand Network Information Center
Contact: Krit Witwiyaruj krit@thnic.or.th
Address: 111 Mu9, Thailand Science Park, 2nd Floor, Room P-206 Thanon Phahon Yothin, Khlong Nueng, Khlong Luang Pathum Thani 12120 Thailand
Tel: +66 2564 8031-2 #112
Website: http://www.thnic.or.th/

Relevant Policy Document URL: http://www.thnic.or.th/homepage2/thaidomain.html

This document provides a description of the IDN (Internationalized Domain Names) Language Table to be used by THNIC in the .th TLD registry for the registration of Thai language .th domains. The policy is consistent and compliant with the ICANN IDN Registry Implementation Guidelines [ICANN] and is intended to be published publicly and registered at the IANA Internationalized Domain Names Character.
